document_data.name: Immult Murauvyn
document_data.mainbody: '''Immult Murauvyn''' was a tax collector in [[Cormyr]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He kept a straight face through many situations, letting only the tiniest crooked smile show.
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|1356}}, Immult, at the time the oldest tax collector in Cormyr, tried to collect back taxes on [[Sabrast Windriver]]. Ultimately, he took him away for forced labor as punishment for his tax evasion and brought [[Vangerdahast]] and four [[Purple Dragon]]s for that purpose. However, [[Elminster]] appeared and brought money enough to cover Sabrast's debts. He was almost rebuffed until he warned them that failing to accept his payment would release four small [[dragon]]s into the treasury of the Palace.
